item.title: Rest In Peace Kobe Bryant
item.description: Source: The Undefeated I am not Kobe fan honestly but just like him, basketball is something I love. I hope he’s at peace because although his journey in life is over, the legacy he left behind is etched in all our souls. Rest In Peace Mamba ğŸ€
